name: Precursor Vault Oracles
description: When you first come upon a vault, use the tables on the previous two pages to help envision its form and nature. For a more abstract prompt, just use the @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.e2bae1632870e2d2]{Descriptor} oracle. In either case—if that’s enough detail for the role of the vault in your story—stop there.
